title.narrative: Women Benefit from Humanitarian Action

description.narrative: women who have been displaced by sudden onset emergencies are meaningfully engaged in the humanitarian response; marginalized women and girls affected by protracted and slow onset crises have access to the required assets, skills and partnerships; and if social services and practices are supportive

title.narrative: Positive coping mechanisms are promoted for refugee and host community women
% of target (6,000) SSD women refugees who have accessed at least 3 cash for work opportunities over the last 12 months.

Number of female headed households (Refugee and host community) in possession of skills and productive assets as per type of livelihood they engage in; crop production, Livestock, fisheries, small business

Capacity of key actors in HA response to plan implement and report gender sensitive programs in all phases of emergency (preparedness, relief and recovery) is strengthened
